content: this text is a summary of a legal case that took place over a period of 5 months the parties involved are not named the case involves the division of property between coheirs according to article 713 of the civil code coheirs have the right to request a division of property in this case the parties reached an agreement and decided to dissolve the community of heirs they requested the attribution of an immovable property that was in dispute a mediator facilitated the process and the parties were represented by their respective lawyers during the mediation an offer was made to purchase the property for €157500 but one party requested a brief postponement to consider the proposal in a subsequent meeting it was decided that one party would sell their share of the property for €78750 and the other party agreed they agreed to proceed with the drafting of a public deed with a notary public the judgment was pending until the deed was signed the mediator declared the proceedings closed and the costs of mediation were determined to be €116713
